title: Spread button must add X/Y to all empty components
description:
dispatched_by: mayor

## Problem
The 'spread overlapping components' button needs to add X and Y coordinates to EVERY empty component, even if there's only one. This is a workaround for a bug in the visualizer component that breaks on empty elements.

## Current behavior
Button may skip single empty components.

## Expected behavior
Always add X/Y to all empty components regardless of count.
